description: Try our easy to follow Fast French Onion Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Fast French Onion Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, place the bread on prepared tray and sprinkle with cheese and extra thyme leaves. Bake for 5 minutes or until cheese is golden. Pour soup into bowls and serve immediately with hot cheese toasts.
